bilingual.target: Pattern 没有公共的构造函数。

bilingual.source: Most people here live in public housing units.
bilingual.target: 这儿大多数的人都居住在公共的单元房里.

bilingual.source: Then I put the suitcase in a public storage room.
bilingual.target: 我把皮箱藏在了一个公共的储藏室.

bilingual.source: Free education for all children in public schools.
bilingual.target: 对所有儿童实行公共的和免费的教育.

bilingual.source: The CRM compensator must expose a public default constructor.
bilingual.target: CRM补偿器必须公开公共的默认构造函数.

bilingual.source: Ship captains and businessmen held most of the public offices.
bilingual.target: 船长和商人拥有很多公共的办公室.

bilingual.source: My girlfriend has private health insurance, while I have public.
bilingual.target: 我女朋友拥有私人医疗保险而我是公共的。

bilingual.source: Put crepe bows round the white necks of the public doves.
bilingual.target: 把绉纱鞠躬放围着公共的鸽子的白颈.

bilingual.source: A public site that lets people view polls and vote in them.
bilingual.target: 在他们中，一个公共的让人们查看投票和选举的网站。

bilingual.source: Despite this, pigs still have a poor image in the public domain.
bilingual.target: 但是, 猪现在在公共的场所还是占很低的地位.

list.abstract: public（英 [ˈpʌblɪk]，美 [ˈpʌblɪk]），英语单词，作形容词为公众的、公共的、与公众有关的等。名词为公众、民众、大众等。短语搭配in public（公开地）。例句有It's important to leave no trace in public spaces.（重要的是不留痕迹在公共场所）。 public的近义词有governmental、commonable、society等。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what happens when you yawn in public.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道自己在公众面前打哈欠的后果吧。

yingyinNormal.en: This is nice. Yeah, I love being spoon-fed in public.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这地方看着真不错。是啊，我可喜欢当众被人喂饭了。

yingyinNormal.en: Nearby, Kensington Palace is open to the public year-round.
yingyinNormal.zh: 附近的肯辛顿宫全年开放给公众参观。

yingyinNormal.en: Because we're public servants, we're trusted to run the government.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为我们是公仆，人民把政府托付给了我们。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't get it. Howard, enable public access. Public access enabled.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还是没明白，霍华德，开启公共接入功能。公共接入已开启。

yingyinNormal.en: For four years I got abused by the public, by the media.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整整四年，我遭到公众和媒体的谩骂，某种意义上 。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Han, you shouldn't bring your sex doll out in public.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿憨，你不该把性爱人偶带来公共场合哦。

yingyinNormal.en: "In the can" meant in the trash outside a public restroom.
yingyinNormal.zh: "在罐里"是指在公共厕所外的垃圾筒里。

yingyinNormal.en: I, need to soften the blow to the NRA before we go public.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正式宣布之前，我得安抚一下全国步枪协会那边。

yingyinNormal.en: They are leading the public into another extreme and it worked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们居心叵测，用舆论将公众领入极端，而很不幸，他们的阴谋也奏效了。

yingyinNormal.en: The hope has been that you'd eventually bend to public opinion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她的本意其实是你最终能变得正常一点。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're waiving your right to keep the video from public view? I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是要放弃对大众保密的权利吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe not right now. Eleanor Waldorf is gearing up to take her company public.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许不是现在，埃莉诺·霍道夫正筹备她的公司上市。

yingyinNormal.en: You're the type that goes to jail. For what? Conspiracy to defraud the public.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而你就是那种要背黑锅入狱的。为了什么？共谋欺骗大众。

yingyinNormal.en: Step 3: Pander to your audience. The best public speakers know how to work around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第三：迎合你的观众优秀的演说家知道要如何迎合观众。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: And speaking of don'ts, men and women do not embrace in public in the Middle East.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说到不该做的在中东，男人和女人不能在公共场合拥抱。

yingyinNormal.en: Lydia will never be easy until she's exposed herself in some public place or other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 丽迪雅非要到公共场所之类的地方去出一出丑，是决不肯罢休的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, this is public radio. Doesn't he realize that dozens of people might hear him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 对啊，这可是公共电台。难道他不知道还有人在听广播节目吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I am calm, Doug. The public's not calm. Every misstep is highlighted and heightened.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很冷静，道格。民众不冷静。每次失足都被强调，放大。

yingyinNormal.en: Because meeting a public health challenge like this isn't just a job for government.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为应对一个像这样的公共卫生挑战，不仅仅是政府的工作。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: relating to the government or state, or things that are done for the people by the state
sense_info_list.zh: 政府的; 公共事务的

examination_example.sentence: In 2009 the number of unionists in America's <highlight>public</highlight> sector passed that of their fellow members in the private sector.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2009年，美国公共部门工会成员的数量超过了私营部门工会成员的数量。

examination_example.sentence: A quarter of America's <highlight>public</highlight>-sector workers have a university degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四分之一的美国公共部门员工拥有大学学位。

examination_example.sentence: In Britain, more than half of <highlight>public</highlight>-sector workers but only about 15% of private-sector ones are unionized.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在英国，超过一半的公共部门员工加入了工会，但只有大约15%的私营部门员工加入了工会。

sense_info_list.en: connected with ordinary people in society in general

examination_example.sentence: That common-sense change enjoys wide <highlight>public</highlight> support and would save the USPS $2 billion per year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种常识性的改变得到了公众的广泛支持，每年将为美国邮政节省20亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: The TSA cannot continue diverting resources into underused PreCheck lanes while most of the traveling <highlight>public</highlight> suffers in unnecessary lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: TSA不能继续在未充分利用的“PreCheck”通道上浪费资源，而让大多数出行的公众忍受不必要的排队时间。

examination_example.sentence: But demanding too much of air travelers or providing too little security in return undermines <highlight>public</highlight> support for the process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而对飞机旅客要求太高，或者提供的安全保障太低只会削弱民众对安检流程的支持。

sense_info_list.en: provided, especially by the government, for the use of people in general

examination_example.sentence: For a time literature showed no interest in this <highlight>public</highlight> stage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一段时间，文学对这个公共舞台不感兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: When Shakespeare was twelve years old, the first <highlight>public</highlight> playhouse was built in London.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在莎士比亚12岁时，第一家公共剧院在伦敦建成。

examination_example.sentence: What matters is that they will belong to a private monopoly which developed them using <highlight>public</highlight> resources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重要的是，它们将属于利用公共资源发展自己的私人垄断企业。

examination_example.sentence: The Food Standards Authority (FSA) has issued a <highlight>public</highlight> warning about the risks of a compound called acrylamide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 食品标准局已就一种被称为丙烯酰胺的化合物带来的风险发出公开警告。

examination_example.sentence: The school board, which is responsible for setting educational policy, looks into the matter and conducts <highlight>public</highlight> hearings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 负责制定教育政策的学校董事会调查此事并举行公开听证会。

examination_example.sentence: Once a discovery claim becomes <highlight>public</highlight>, the discoverer receives intellectual credit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦公众接受一项发现声明，发现者会获得知识声誉。

examination_example.sentence: The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 has pushed most <highlight>public</highlight> companies to defer performance bonuses for senior executives by about a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2002年的《萨班斯-奥克斯利法案》促使大多数上市公司将高管的绩效奖金推迟约一年。

examination_example.sentence: It is argued that the influence of transient investment on <highlight>public</highlight> companies can be adverse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人认为，短期投资对上市公司的影响可能是不利的。

examination_example.sentence: They also need better <highlight>public</highlight> relations skills than their predecessors, as the costs of even a minor slipup can be significant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与前任相比，他们还需要更好的公关技巧，因为即使是一个小失误，它的代价也可能是巨大的。

word_usage.usage: public作形容词，表示“大众的；百姓的；公共的；政府的”时，只用于名词之前，修饰该名词，如：public health
public作形容词时，无比较级和最高级。

public作名词，表示“平民；百姓；民众”时，是集合名词，常与定冠词the连用，一般不指具体的人，没有复数形式。
作主语视为整体时，其谓语动词用第三人称单数形式；
指某些群众时，其谓语动词用复数形式，如：The public has/have a right to know what is contained in the report. 公众有权知道报告中的内容。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists play a part in transmitting information to journalists and ultimately the <highlight>public</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家在向记者乃至公众传递信息方面发挥着作用。

examination_example.sentence: There, his students of "citizen statistics" learn to analyze <highlight>public</highlight> information like the federal budget and corporate reports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那里，他的“公民统计学”学生学习分析联邦预算和企业报告等公共信息。

examination_example.sentence: Funding agencies note that data paid for with <highlight>public</highlight> money should be <highlight>public</highlight> information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 资助机构指出，用公共资金支付的数据应该是公共信息。

examination_example.sentence: But scientists who want to communicate with the general <highlight>public</highlight> need to modify their language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，想要与公众交流的科学家需要调整他们的语言。

examination_example.sentence: What does Shulman suggest scientists do when communicating with the general <highlight>public</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Shulman建议科学家在与公众沟通时做什么？

examination_example.sentence: And what is in the best interest of a deceased person's legacy may conflict with the desires of their family or the <highlight>public</highlight>, says Edwards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 爱德华兹说，符合死者遗产最大利益的东西可能会与他们的家人或公众的愿望相冲突。

examination_example.sentence: Use <highlight>public</highlight> transport when traveling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 旅行时使用公共交通工具。

examination_example.sentence: California legislators passed a bill last year that will bring ethnic studies to all its <highlight>public</highlight> high schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州立法者去年通过了一项法案，将把种族研究引入所有公立高中。

examination_example.sentence: Since the beginning of this century, an increasing amount of time has been shifted in <highlight>public</highlight> schools from recess to academic activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自本世纪初以来，公立学校越来越多的时间从课间休息转移到学术活动上。

examination_example.sentence: They raised <highlight>public</highlight> awareness of the possible causes of heart disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们提高了公众对造成心脏病可能原因的认识。

examination_example.sentence: They turned <highlight>public</highlight> attention away from the health risks of sugar to fat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把公众的注意力从糖的健康风险转移到脂肪上。

examination_example.sentence: They did not catch <highlight>public</highlight> attention in the United States until the 1990s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到20世纪90年代，它们才引起了美国公众的注意。

word_usage.usage:
public表“民众”或“具有共同特征的群体”，常与定冠词the连用，构成单数集合名词，谓语动词一般用单数形式。
示例：The museum is now open to the public. 
博物馆现在向公众开放了。
public作形容词时，无比较级和最高级。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: done, perceived, or existing in open view

examination_example.sentence: Any <highlight>public</highlight> space has been carefully designed by an artistic mind to be both functional and beautiful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何公共空间都经过艺术头脑的精心设计，既实用又美观。

examination_example.sentence: Last week some city officials suggested the city might be interested in turning the old theater into a museum and <highlight>public</highlight> meeting place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，一些市政官员表示，市政府可能有兴趣把这个旧剧院改造成博物馆和公众集会场所。

examination_example.sentence: The person leaves it in a <highlight>public</highlight> place, hoping that the book will have an adventure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个人把它放在一个公共场所，希望这本书会有一次冒险。

examination_example.sentence: Great improvements in <highlight>public</highlight> health have been brought about by advances in medical science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医学的进步给公众健康带来了巨大的良好之处。

examination_example.sentence: The trend, then, was toward the "penny paper"—a term referring to papers made widely available to the <highlight>public</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当时的趋势是“便士报”——一个术语，指广泛向公众提供的报纸。

examination_example.sentence: Now this former royal palace is open to the <highlight>public</highlight> as a major tourist attraction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，这座昔日的皇宫作为主要旅游景点向公众开放。

word_usage.usage: 当名词讲时，public是集体名词，单数形式表示复数意义。但the public作主语时，谓语用单数复数均可：The public is/are requested not to leave waste in public places.公众请勿在公共场所乱扔垃圾。

examination_example.sentence: However, in their hometowns like Australia and America, <highlight>public</highlight> traffic is not so convenient, but dear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，在他们家乡，比如澳大利亚和美国，公共交通不方便又昂贵。

examination_example.sentence: It's necessary for us to wear masks (口罩) in <highlight>public</highlight> places during the COVID-19 period.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在新冠肺炎时期，我们有必要在公共场所佩戴口罩。

examination_example.sentence: I don't know how to make a speech in <highlight>public</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不知道如何在公共场合发表演讲。

examination_example.sentence: The high-speed growth of forests cannot happen without <highlight>public</highlight> participation (参与).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有公众的参与，森林不可能高速增长。

examination_example.sentence: So far, the hospitals have received a great deal of encouragement from the <highlight>public</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，医院得到了公众的大力支持。

examination_example.sentence: Of course the <highlight>public</highlight> should raise environmental awareness and realize it is everyone's duty to protect the environment．

word_usage.usage: public作形容词时，无比较级和最高级。

in public是固定搭配，意为“公开地；在别人（尤指生人）面前。
如：Her husband was always nice to her in public.
她的丈夫在别人面前对她很好。

public表“民众”或“具有共同特征的群体”，常与定冠词the连用，构成单数集合名词，谓语动词一般用单数形式。
示例：The museum is now open to the public. 
博物馆现在向公众开放了。
